item.meaning: Mosses have weak roots ; thin, delicate leaves and do not have seeds.
Conifers do not have flowers and their seeds are made in cones.
Reptiles are animals that have dry , scaly skin, live mainly on land and lay eggs with soft shells.
Photosynthesis is the way in which a plant uses light energy from the sun to make food.
Invertebrates are animals without a backbone.
Mammals are warm-blooded animals usually with fur or hair , that feed their young with milk from the mother.
Ferns have strong stem, roots and leaves and do not have seeds.
